body_html: You're going to be so happy to hear that this is never going to happen again in the future, thanks to the incredible improvements we made to the Bazel downloader. Policy now dictates we have redundant mirrors for everything. It's going to do wonders for preserving the archival integrity of this software. bazelbuild/bazel@ed7ced0
